title: Poster, 1993–94
inscribed: Printed in black ink, lower right: RUDOLPH W. GIULIANI, ALCALDE, CIUDAD DE NUEVA YORK MARGARET A. HAMBURG, M.D., COMISIONADA, DEPARTAMENTO DE SALUD DE LA CIUDAD DE NUEVA YORK
creditline: Gift of the Department of Health, New York City
description: Comic book-style poster dealing with AIDS.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, 1993–94.Lithograph on paper. Gift of the Department of Health, New York City. 1996-2-4.
